name: AutoClicker (Realinspirer)
description:
This is another auto-clicker program. I mean, a drop in the ocean won't make too much difference, so here I am with another of these programs.

This program has  modern UI and controls. Hope you'll like it. Actually, the main auto-clicker program is just a console application. And the GUI application can be used to set the setting for the auto-clicker. You'll know what I mean after you run the program.

You can experience app crashes. Sorry for that. Actually, I made this app on a different technology, just to realize that it was a bad idea. But at the end of the day, it is what it is!

- Realinspirer

P.S. - I want a girlfriend. And it sucks to not have one rn.
